snippet: Senator Rand Paul took a firm position on the side of people who say vaccination is a personal choice, overshadowing earlier comments by Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey and inserting himself into a hot debate that will likely resurface if the...
abstract: Senator Rand Paul took a firm position on the side of people who say vaccination is a personal choice, overshadowing earlier comments by Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey and inserting himself into a hot debate that will likely resurface if the senator runs for president.

headline.main: Paul Calls Vaccination a Matter of Freedom
